ratings.comment: A fun professor and didn't want to make your life too difficult. I had him for LSC 432 which is an easy class about social media. If you take it, make sure you're with a group you trust. Very helpful but sometimes not responsive to email. Some grading criteria was not outlined well in the course, but just do your best and you'll get an A.

Donald Stanley is one of the best professors I have ever had. Really knew the subject matter and has lots of experience. Lectures are always interesting and very hands-on. No tests just a few projects.
